MVC

Class TowerDefenseModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • MVC.TowerDefenseModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TowerDefenseModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    YongqiJia & JasonFukumoto & QingzhouPan & GuojunWei CSC 335, Fall 2019 Team Project The model class has all the data for the game, intBoard, objBoard, the clicked tower information, enemyWave list, etc,.
    See Also:
